text:
At 5:00 PM today, Prime Minister Andrew Holness will hold a press conference at the OPM. PBCJ will be live via TV channel, YouTube, Facebook and Twitter. 
Keep watching PBCJ... The People's Station.  

#PressBriefing #PrimeMinister #PressConference #COVID19 #Vaccine #Update https://t.co/ix9LfplTMY
